biotools.summary: Given the amino acid sequence of a putative alpha-helical membrane protein, this tool predicts the topology of the protein, i.e. a specification of the membrane spanning segments and their IN/OUT orientation relative to the membrane.

bioschemas.name: SCAMPI2
bioschemas.summary: Given the amino acid sequence of a putative alpha-helical membrane protein, this tool predicts the topology of the protein, i.e. a specification of the membrane spanning segments and their IN/OUT orientation relative to the membrane.
